summary: Use this api to delete items of the discount activity
description: Use this api to delete items of the discount activity

query.name: discount_id
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a discount activity.

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

query.name: page_size
query.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

schema.name: response
schema.description: Detail informations you are querying.

schema.name: status
schema.description: The status of discount promotion

schema.name: discount_name
schema.description: Title of the discount.

schema.name: item_list
schema.description: The items selected in this discount.

schema.name: item_promotion_price
schema.description: The discount price of the item. If there is variation, this value is 0.

schema.name: item_name
schema.description: Name of the item in local language.

schema.name: model_list
schema.description: The models belong to this item.

schema.name: model_name
schema.description: Name of the variation that belongs to the same item.

schema.name: model_normal_stock
schema.description: The current stock quantity of the variation.

schema.name: model_original_price
schema.description: The original price before discount of the variation.

schema.name: model_promotion_price
schema.description: The discount price of the variation.

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a variation of an item.

schema.name: model_inflated_price_of_original_price
schema.description: The original price after tax of model (Only for taxable Shop).

schema.name: model_inflated_price_of_promotion_price
schema.description: The discount price after tax of model (Only for taxable Shop).

schema.name: model_promotion_stock
schema.description: The reserved stock of the model.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

schema.name: purchase_limit
schema.description: The max number of this product in the promotion price.

schema.name: item_original_price
schema.description: The original price before discount of the item. If there is variation, this value is 0.

schema.name: normal_stock
schema.description: The current stock quantity of the item.

schema.name: item_inflated_price_of_original_price
schema.description: The original price after tax of item (Only for taxable Shop).

schema.name: item_inflated_price_of_promotion_price
schema.description: The discount price after tax of item (Only for taxable Shop).

schema.name: item_promotion_stock
schema.description: The reserved stock of the item. If the item has no variation, this param is necessary.

schema.name: start_time
schema.description: The time when discount activity start.

schema.name: discount_id
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a discount activity.

schema.name: end_time
schema.description: The time when discount activity end.

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of items.
